article_title: Second annual Health and Resource Expo to be held in Highland next weekend
article_text:
Want to go?

What: Second annual Health and Resource Expo

When: 10 a.m. to 3 p.m. May 14

Where: Erwin Center, 913 N. Pryor St., Gastonia

Why go: Information on health-related resources will be...
